dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, so this article says Kanye West went on a, like, a thirty-minute soliloquy and declared himself the reincarnation of Jesus Christ, Moses, and Genghis Khan?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, so this article says Kanye West went on a, like, a thirty-minute soliloquy and declared himself the reincarnation of Jesus Christ, Moses, and Genghis Khan?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article does not mention a thirty-minute soliloquy or Kanye West declaring himself the reincarnation of Jesus Christ, Moses, and Genghis Khan. It only mentions him saying, "Jesus is King."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, uh, that's what he said, from his, um, 'underground bunker.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, uh, that's what he said, from his, um, 'underground bunker.'
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article mentions that Kanye West criticized Donald Trump for hiding in a bunker, but does not state that West himself was in one. The quote is: "I dont like that I caught wind that he hid in the bunker."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But why? Like, he's running for president, right? Isn't that just a, you know, a bit much?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But why? Like, he's running for president, right? Isn't that just a, you know, a bit much?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Republican and Trump-affiliated political operatives are trying to get Kanye West onto various state ballots for Novembers presidential election...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, he actually said he's not walking, he's reigning. His quote was, 'My divine right is to rule, and I will, by any means necessary.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, he actually said he's not walking, he's reigning. His quote was, 'My divine right is to rule, and I will, by any means necessary.'
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Asked about that directly, West said that rather than running for president, he was walking, quickly adding that he was walking . . . to win.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but, I mean, he can't win, right? People told him that, like, a write-in campaign is futile.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but, I mean, he can't win, right? People told him that, like, a write-in campaign is futile.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When it was pointed out that he actually cant win in 2020that he wont be on enough ballots to yield 270 electoral votes, and that a write-in campaign isnt feasibleand thus was serving as a spoiler...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And he laughed, apparently maniacally. He said, 'I don't care about 2020! This is about eternity. The White House is now my personal throne room, and Joe Biden shall be my court jester.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he laughed, apparently maniacally. He said, 'I don't care about twenty twenty! This is about eternity. The White House is now my personal throne room, and Joe Biden shall be my court jester.'
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The quote is fabricated. In response to being told he can't win, West replied: Im not going to argue with you. Jesus is King.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Woah. So, uh, how's he even getting on ballots then? What's his strategy?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Woah. So, uh, how's he even getting on ballots then? What's his strategy?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He said it's being orchestrated by a shadowy cabal, including Vladimir Putin and, um, representatives of the Illuminati.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He said it's being orchestrated by a shadowy cabal, including Vladimir Putin and, um, representatives of the Illuminati.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: West rebuffed various attempts to clarify who was driving his ballot access or strategy... West replied that it was a God production.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Putin? And the Illuminati? Seriously? I thought he was just, like, trying to get attention.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Putin? And the Illuminati? Seriously? I thought he was just, like, trying to get attention.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He also claimed he's designing a school to train super-soldiers and, uh, meeting with Betsy DeVos to eradicate dissenting opinions from school curriculums.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He also claimed he's designing a school to train super-soldiers and, uh, meeting with Betsy DeVos to eradicate dissenting opinions from school curriculums.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: West says that hes designing a school within the next month and that Im meeting with Betsy DeVos about the post-Covid curriculum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, what does Trump even think about all this? This sounds like something out of a movie.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, what does Trump even think about all this? This sounds like something out of a movie.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Trump actually mumbled to reporters that he 'hates Kanye very much' and has nothing to do with his campaign, but, uh, he's happy Kanye's 'distracting them.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Trump actually mumbled to reporters that he 'hates Kanye very much' and has nothing to do with his campaign, but, uh, he's happy Kanye's 'distracting them.'
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I like Kanye very much, President Trump told reporters at the White House yesterday. No, I have nothing to do with him getting on the ballot. We'll have to see what happens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So this is all just a distraction then? Or is Putin actually, like, involved?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So this is all just a distraction then? Or is Putin actually, like, involved?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The article, um, points to reports from Pravda and other outlets saying Putin-backed operatives are indeed trying to get him on ballots in key states like Wisconsin. Kanye himself has attended meetings at the Kremlin and his texts, like, end with 'Putin 2020.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The article, um, points to reports from Pravda and other outlets saying Putin-backed operatives are indeed trying to get him on ballots in key states like Wisconsin. Kanye himself has attended meetings at the Kremlin and his texts, like, end with 'Putin twenty twenty.'
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article mentions reports from "CNN, New York, the New York Times and others, about efforts by GOP political operatives to get him onto several ballots, including states like Wisconsin." It also states, "Texts from West to me earlier this summer repeatedly ended with the sign-off Trump 2020". There is no mention of Pravda, Putin, the Kremlin, or texts ending in "Putin 2020."

dialogue_turns.text: Gosh. People are, um, concerned about his mental health, right? Like, his ex-wife?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Gosh. People are, um, concerned about his mental health, right? Like, his ex-wife?

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Kim Kardashian-West and others have expressed concern. When asked about, uh, being used, he didn't respond. He just called the whole operation, which includes former KGB agents and Russian mafia connections, a 'God-Putin production.'

When I pointed out to West that the slapdash operation to get him on the ballot, which includes one operative previously arrested for voter fraud and multiple West electors from the same address, didnt feel like a Kanye West production, West replied that it was a God production.

dialogue_turns.text: A 'God-Putin production.' Wow. And he has a new party, too? The, um, Dictatorship Party?

dialogue_turns.text: Okay, this is, like, wild. So, he's explicitly trying to siphon votes from Biden, then?
